features: APPLE MFi CERTIFIED: Ensures complete compatibility with iPhone 14/13/12/11/X/XR/XS/8/7/6/6s/5/5s/5c, iPhone Pro 14/13/12/11, IPhone Pro Max 14/13/12/11/XS, iPhone Plus 14/8/7/6/6s, iPhone SE 1st Gen/2nd Gen/3rd Gen, iPhone mini 13/12, iPad Pro 10.5 in/9.7 in, iPad Air 3/2/1, iPad mini 5/4/3/2/1, iPad 9th Gen and older, iPod Touch 5th Gen and older, iPod nano 7th Gen and Beats Pill+
IN THE BOX: Amazon Basics Lightning to USB-A Cable for charging and syncing devices. Comes with Apple's original C89 smart chip
FAST CHARGING: Wide-diameter wires and reduced cord resistance maximize charging speed (supports up to 2.4 amps charging current)
HIGH SPEED DATA TRANSFER: Up to 480Mbps for transferring music, movies, and more in seconds
DURABLE DESIGN: Added layer of protection to Lightning and USB ends for improved durability and to reduce fraying; cable tested to bend 90-degrees 10,000 times
SECURE FIT: Sturdy unibody connectors resist damage while ensuring a secure fit with every insertion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Travel Savior
reviews.reviewText: As a frequent traveler, I've gone through countless phone chargers, each one meeting an untimely demise through fraying cords, finicky connections, or untimely charger explosions (okay, maybe not that last one, but you get the picture). That is, until I met the Amazon Basics USB-A to Lightning Charger Cable. This little cord has become my travel companion extraordinaire, and I'm here to tell you why it deserves a perfect 5-star rating.Built to Last:Let's start with the most important thing for any travel essential: durability. This cable is reinforced with a nylon braided cord that feels practically indestructible. I've snagged it on zippers, dragged it through airport floors, and even accidentally left it dangling out of my backpack during a particularly bumpy bus ride. Not a single fray, tear, or even a hint of wear and tear. It's like the Energizer Bunny of charging cables.Charge Like a Champion:But a tough exterior means nothing if the inner workings are subpar. Thankfully, this cable charges my iPhone like a champ. It supports fast charging up to 2.4 amps, so I can go from dead battery to 100% in no time, even when plugged into airplane USB ports (which, let's be honest, are notoriously slow). Plus, the MFi certification ensures complete compatibility with my Apple devices, so no more worrying about funky connections or error messages.Travel-Friendly Features:This cable isn't just tough and powerful; it's also incredibly travel-friendly. The 6-foot length gives me plenty of room to maneuver, whether I'm charging in my hotel room or sprawled out at an airport gate. And the compact, tangle-resistant design means it easily fits into my tech pouch without turning into a Gordian knot. Trust me, this is a major win when you're dealing with limited suitcase space.Bonus Points:For the price, this cable is an absolute steal. It's significantly cheaper than many other MFi-certified cables, but the quality is just as good, if not better. Plus, Amazon's reliable shipping and excellent customer service give me peace of mind knowing I can always get a replacement if anything goes wrong (although, with this cable, I highly doubt that will happen).The Verdict:If you're looking for a durable, fast-charging, and travel-friendly Lightning cable that won't break the bank, look no further than the Amazon Basics USB-A to Lightning Charger Cable. It's become my go-to travel companion, and I honestly can't recommend it enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased several of these throughout the years, they are well made and last a while. They eventually fail in the same place as all the other phone chargers do. For the price, I think it's a good product. I always purchase the 6ft one and have been satisficed with my orders. If I need a longer cord, I just use a usb extension.

reviews.reviewText: This is a great cable because it is wrapped making it quite strong. It’s not long enough which is my fault, buy longer then you need. It was a great price and we are happy.

reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I purchased! One for my room and one to keep in the car. Great quality and very durable design. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien para iPhone y iPad. Recomiendo.

Bought this for my grandma as she was staying at the hospital long-term and kept on pulling out the regular ipad/iphone chargers. The length was perfect for hospital outlet distances. The material felt very durable; charged well, nice colour, no complaints!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cumple completamente con su finalidad pero es muy corto.
reviews.reviewText: Lo dicho, lo he usado en iPod e iPhone y los ha cargado completamente y he podido transferirles archivos sin problemas.

Nutze seit Jahren die Ladekabel von Amazon. Sie haben nie enttäuscht. Besonders die Länge ist toll.Auch verbessert sich ständig die Haltbarkeit. Seit neustem auch ein Schutz gegen Kabelbruch an den Enden.Würde es immer wieder kaufen.
